positive_examples: This is an example of service robot.
The service robot demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed service robot in this context.
A typical case of service robot would involve these features.
The concept of service robot applies here.
A robot designed to perform useful tasks for humans in non-industrial environments like homes, hospitals, or offices.
negative_examples: This is an example of autonomous mobile robot, not service robot.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: AutonomousMobileRobot, or other types of Robot

definition: A robot designed to assist humans with service tasks outside manufacturing.
